definition: at ease/to feel relieved/to set one's mind at rest/to keep one's mind on sth
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Love is when thought of him steadies your nerves.
sentences.chinese: 愛是一想到他你就會覺得安心。

sentences.english: You can best use board-mount miniature POTs for anything you want to set-and-forget.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用電路板式可變電阻讓您安心的遺忘它。

sentences.english: Ask your provider which nonprescription medicines are safe to use.
sentences.chinese: 詢問醫護人員，那些非處方的藥是可以安心服用的。

sentences.english: These early talkies are more reassuring as movies.
sentences.chinese: 這些早期的對白比電影更讓人覺得安心。

sentences.english: I eased her mind by telling her that the children were safe.
sentences.chinese: 我告訴她孩子們平安無恙，讓她安心。

sentences.english: Until that's resolved, I don't think we can never be comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 在這個問題解決之前，我想我們不會安心的。

sentences.english: The leaders at the level of the township do not put their whole heart into their work, which is the main issue.
sentences.chinese: 當前鄉鎮幹部不安心鄉鎮工作的問題較爲突出。

sentences.english: Does not contain an element of triethanolamine consumers more peace of mind safe to use.
sentences.chinese: 不含三乙醇胺的成份讓消費者更安心安全使用。

sentences.english: Felt the reassurance of her presence from the weight of her against his ankles and feet.
sentences.chinese: 只有感覺到它枕着自己的腳踝和腳的重量，他才安心。

sentences.english: I eased her mind by telling her that the children are safe.
sentences.chinese: 我告訴她孩子們平安無恙，讓她安心。

sentences.english: Her daughter was hoping that after talking to me, Henrietta would finally be able to rest.
sentences.chinese: 她女兒希望，亨利埃塔和我交談後最終能夠安心。

sentences.english: Objective To study the metabolites from Su'anxin nasal inhalant patches.
sentences.chinese: 目的對蘇安心鼻吸貼在家兔體內的代謝產物進行研究。

sentences.english: Quality assurance, shifting Baotui three months, so your peace of mind with.
sentences.chinese: 品質保證，三個月包換包退，讓你用的安心。

sentences.english: We may even believe that God no longer loves us.
sentences.chinese: 不論日夜，任何時間，我們都能得著安慰也能安心。

sentences.english: Well you at ease and recuperate.

definition: to feel relieved/to feel reassured/to be at ease
firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
to cause no trouble/to be spared worry/worry-free
fears of trouble in the rear (idiom); family worries (obstructing freedom of action)/worries about the future consequences/often in negative expressions, meaning "no worries about anything"
Anting township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
(saying) to be very scared and on edge
